headline.main: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track
headline.print_headline: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track

lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions has been on the job less than a month but has already made some civil rights groups nervous by indicating the Justice Department will likely soften its focus on protecting voter rights and monitoring troubled police departments.
